title: Count negative values in array - write code

content.question: Consider an int array named nums, which has been properly declared and initialized with one or more values. Which of the following code segments counts the number of negative values found in nums and stores the count in counter?

choices.label: int counter = 0; int i = 0; while (i < nums.length) { if (nums[i] < 0) { counter++; i++; } }
int counter = 0; int i = 0; while (i <= nums.length - 1) { if (nums[i] < 0) { counter++; } i++; }
int counter = 0; for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) { if (nums[i] < 0) { counter++; } }
int counter = 0; for (int i : nums) { if (nums[i] < 0) { counter++; } }

content.answer: int counter = 0; int i = 0; while (i <= nums.length - 1) { if (nums[i] < 0) { counter++; } i++; }

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
